abstract: Along with the New York modernist landmark, 65 other sites were placed on the 2102 World Monuments Watch, a list of endangered cultural heritage sites across the globe.
snippet: Along with the New York modernist landmark, 65 other sites were placed on the 2102 World Monuments Watch, a list of endangered cultural heritage sites across the globe.

headline.main: World Monuments Fund Places Manufacturers Hanover Building on At-Risk List
headline.print_headline: Fifth Ave. Building On Endangered List
